Description:
The DiagnosticReport resource represents a resulted, patient-related, non-medication order and data associated with the order and the patient.

This resource returns textual results and discrete result components. It can return lab, imaging, and cardiology results. It can also return micro and EKG and pathology results that are not a scan. Scans filed into Epic are not returned by this resource.

The read interaction enables the look up of a DiagnosticReport resource by a constant server ID. The read interaction allows clients to store only the server ID, and with a single request, retrieve the most up-to-date result data on a patient. Read interactions typically begin with a client having previously established a relationship, often through querying for DiagnosticReports through the search interaction.

DiagnosticReport.Name: DiagnosticReport
DiagnosticReport.Description: An instance of the R4 DiagnosticReport resource.

category.Name: category
category.Description: The service category. This can be an Epic order type or part of the US Core valueset for DiagnosticReport.

code.Name: code
code.Description: The Name/Code for this diagnostic report.

effectiveDateTime.Name: effectiveDateTime
effectiveDateTime.Description: Clinically relevant time/time period for report.

encounter.Name: encounter
encounter.Description:
Encounter when the test was ordered.

Encounter when the test was ordered.

This will be either a FHIR Encounter reference in the encounter.reference element, or an encounter CSN identifier in the encounter.identifier element.

identifier.Name: identifier
identifier.Description: The business identifier for the report.

issued.Name: issued
issued.Description:
DateTime this version was released.

Available starting in the February 2022 version of Epic and in the November 2021 version with special updates.

performer.Name: performer
performer.Description: Participants in producing the report. This always includes one or more references to the Practitioner resource. Starting in the May 2022 version of Epic or the February 2022 version by special update, this element can also include a reference to an Organization resource.

presentedForm.Name: presentedForm
presentedForm.Description:
Shows links to the entire Binary textual results of the report.

Available starting in the November 2021 version of Epic and in the August 2021 version with special updates.

title.Name: title
title.Description: Label to display in place of the data.

url.Name: url
url.Description: Binary link for the textual content.

result.Name: result
result.Description: Observations, simple or complex nested groups.

SmartData.Name: extension
SmartData.Description: A data entity that captures a value. This element is available starting in the February 2022 version of Epic.

status.Name: status
status.Description: The status of the report. You can find the list of values here: http://hl7.org/fhir/diagnostic-report-status.
